snippet: Recently discovered sketches from the Disney vaults reveal that a New Yorker once had the ear of one of animation’s most iconic villains.
abstract: Fox Carney, Disney library research manager, shares recently discovered sketches of distinctly New York-accented vulture that was originally slated to be sidekick for evil sorceress Maleficent in 1959 classic Sleeping Beauty; says bonus features of bird will be in new Blu-ray release of classic.
lead_paragraph: Recently discovered sketches from the Disney vaults reveal that a New Yorker once had the ear of one of animation’s most iconic villains.

headline.print_headline: A Disney Discovery in Forgotten Sketches
headline.main: A Disney Discovery in Forgotten Sketches
